replies.body: Trying to find a comment to upvote... but can't. .-.
Holy, you just came to a old piece of perfection friend, here's a comment for you to upvote :D
This is amazing.
I went around upvoting but then I realised every comment had 4 upvotes so I had to stop.
You sir deserve a medal for helping keeping the balance.
I downvoted the thread to keep it at 256 which is 4^4 or 4 x 4 x 4 x 4.
When you see the 4 upvote trend, then start patrolling the thread to make sure each comment has 4 upvotes...or 4 downvotes...whatever equates to (-)4.
Indeed, in fact, i just downvoted your comment to put it at 4 upvotes.

The current amount of up votes on this post is 256 which is 4^4 

Do not touch this post it is perfection

Yup, just confirmed. But...

{{champion:202}}:perfection isn't good enough.

So, to 4444 upvotes we go. :D
Thread now has 4 x 4 x 4 x 4 upvotes. Perfection.
haha this is great

the fact that most if all the comments in this thread have 4 upvotes is amazing to me, as well a flat out hilarious. You already got my upvote , but this needs to be documented in boards  history. lets make it to 4444 ppl!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

#Why does Jhin hates Annie?

{{champion:1}} : Let's count to 5!
{{champion:202}} : _triggered_
I would've upvoted but 4 upvotes already :/
I still don't understand how a joke like this gets 15 downvotes, dafuq....
We're trying to keep all the comments at 4 upvotes/downvotes.
One of these days one of these threads will get exactly 44 upvotes and then get closed.
Would 444 suffice?
4444 is better
Agreed, but the odds of getting that many upvotes is unlikely.
There must be a pioneer for everything. I shall be the one.

Let me give you a little context on that...

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1424218

This thread has over 6k up votes.

It lasted over 2 years in order to acquire the vast amount.

It was also when the forums had a much greater population.

It's pretty unlikely at this point. As it is, the highest downvote count I've ever seen is 1k from a thread of some ELO Terrorist in GD. No other thread has gotten anywhere close up or down.

You should've seen the downvotes on this:http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/8a75KeUR-the-indefinite-banning-of-tyler1
They were all from the first two weeks, and there were hundreds of upvotes.

Riot posts don't count.

BTW, only one other thread beat my thread in upvotes. It was a Rioter thread baiting "if you give us +9000 for this bad news, we'll do a dance party."

They were true to their word. The thread skyrocketed to well over +10k.
I'm honest to god surprised that more than 2,000 people watch his stream, much less want him unbanned.

NO!!!! YOU CAN'T DESTROY MY CONFIDENCE!! Even if it takes 10 years, I will take what's rightfully mine.

Ok /s off.
perfect{{champion:202}}

What Perfection looks like.  {{champion:202}} 



(4 words)
KEEP EVERY COMMENT HERE AT 4 UPVOTES THIS IS PERFECT
HOLY S***, a rioter!!
And of all rioters, it's gypsy... You're one lucky goose :^)
Please help keep the balance, there are comments with upvotes above 4
Doing my part by getting it 1 upvote closer to 4444 upvotes!
444 upvotes??
k upvoted downvoted every comment to a multiple of 4
I'm a simple man, I see a Jhin four joke, I upvote.
downvoted to try to get to 4
Pls upvote this man to 4 upvotes pls.

pls upvote THIS man to 4 upvotes...do it for the art. 

DO IT FOR THE ART

Yes! And also Upvote THIS ^^ man to 4 upvotes pls

UPVOTE EVERYONE TO 4 UPVOTES!

upvoted you to your 3rd upvote

now someone give em the 4th one already
but you're the fifth comment...
They all had 4 upvotes, so I made them all 5... give me 4 downvotes :^)

{{champion:240}} : Damn trespassers!

Punish him by upvoting him to four as well.
WEVE DONE IT
Almost i had to re upvote everyone again now we just need the next 4 guys to each skip 3 guys and give the 4th an upvote and were good

This is the longest chain of +/-4 votes I've seen on the boards...
Let's keep it up! :D
This thread is amazing with all the 4 upvotes XD
